name: A Demonstrative Apparition
description:
Kinetic novel demo/prototype for Freesource Jam using TyranoBuilder.

Certain elements like transitions or text placement might display differently in the web version than they do in the desktop version.

Game, scenario, and placeholder logo by happyaggro
https://happyaggro.itch.io/placeholder-logo-asset
Made in TyranoBuilder
Sprites from Jewel Savior
http://www.jewel-s.jp/download
Backgrounds from Uncle MUGEN
https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=52&t=17302
Backgrounds altered with FotoSketcher
http://fotosketcher.com/
Generika Blue UI from Avery
http://fuckyeahrenpy.tumblr.com/post/87038652532/giovsrenpy-introducing-gui-no-3-generika
